net.enilink.komma.dm.change

Class DataChangeSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.enilink.komma.dm.change.DataChangeSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataChangeSupport

    public class DataChangeSupport
extends Object
implements IDataChangeSupport
    Tracks changes to an IDataManager by implementing the interface IDataChangeSupport.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.enilink.komma.dm.change.IDataChangeSupport

      • setDefaultEnabled

        public void setDefaultEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: IDataChangeSupport
        Sets the default enabled state for change tracking. This can be overwritten on a per-thread basis by using the method IDataChangeSupport.setEnabled(IDataManager, boolean).
        Specified by:
        setDefaultEnabled in interface IDataChangeSupport
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if change tracking should be enabled, else false

      • setDefaultMode

        public void setDefaultMode(IDataChangeSupport.Mode mode)
        Description copied from interface: IDataChangeSupport
        Sets the default change tracking mode. This can be overwritten on a per-thread basis by using the method IDataChangeSupport.setMode(IDataManager, Mode).
        Specified by:
        setDefaultMode in interface IDataChangeSupport
        Parameters:
        mode - The default change tracking mode

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(IDataManager dm,
                       boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: IDataChangeSupport
        Enables or disables change tracking for the given data manager. If null is passed for the parameter dm then the enabled state is set for all data managers within the current thread.
        Specified by:
        setEnabled in interface IDataChangeSupport
        Parameters:
        dm - The data manager
        enabled - true if change tracking should be enabled, else false

      • setMode

        public void setMode(IDataManager dm,
                    IDataChangeSupport.Mode mode)
        Description copied from interface: IDataChangeSupport
        Sets the change tracking mode for the given data manager. If null is passed for the parameter dm then the change tracking mode is set for all data managers within the current thread.
        Specified by:
        setMode in interface IDataChangeSupport
        Parameters:
        dm - The data manager
        mode - The change tracking mode

        Tracks the change of a namespace binding.
        Specified by:
        setNamespace in interface IDataChangeSupport
        Parameters:

        prefix - The prefix that has been changed
